text: 3:10 Jenesis 1:26; Rom 12:2; Efesus 2:10; 4:24gumazamizir igiabar otifi, mati gumazim korotiar ghurim sueghava korotiar igiam aru. Ezɨ God, gumazir ian ingarizɨ ia gumazamizir igiabar otivizir kam, a kamaghɨn ifonge, a ia damutɨ ia bar deravɨram a gɨfogham. Kamaghsua, a ia gamuavɨra itima ia an mɨraram otivavɨra iti.
